name: Beyond my little light
description:
This is an entry to a Halloween game jam called "Bite Sized Horror Game" hosted by Greg Karber. It should incorporate the keyword "beyond". I did this by limiting visibility for the player, so the player constantly has to fear what lies beyond his sight. It was a lot of fun and work to make this game, but I loved every minute of it (though my family probably felt differently about it). I did the graphics myself and as you can see I am fairly new to this part. The music was taken from nosoapradio_us, a great site on facebook with lots of free music for indie game developers.

Enjoy the game and I would love to have feedback on it.
